thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by S.T.H.

author: S.T.H.
title: S.T.H.
text: My interest is in olive oil that really is from the first cold pressing, with organically grown olives, and with no adulteration with any other type of oil. Thatâ€™s very likely what I bought but certainty requires more experience using the oils, or additional supporting evidence that is not susceptible to being faked. A five star rating comes only with perfect certainty.
